mapper.select: SELECT POWR AS powrStatus, HTTP AS tempStatus, DEVC_ID AS deviceId, OPMD AS modeValue FROM TBR_OPR_DEVICE_STATUS WHERE DEVC_ID = #{deviceId}
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, PW as userPassword FROM TBR_OPR_ACCOUNT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT a.USER_ID AS userId, a.DEVC_ID AS deviceId, b.DEVC_MODL_CD AS deviceModelCode FROM TBR_OPR_USER_DEVICE a INNER JOIN TBR_IOT_DEVICE b ON a.DEVC_ID = b.DEVC_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT DEVC_NICK AS deviceNickname, ADDR_NICK AS addressNickname FROM TBT_OPR_DEVICE_REGIST WHERE DEVC_ID = #{deviceId} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS googleCount FROM TBR_OPR_ACCOUNT WHERE GOOGLE_STATE = #{googleState}
